tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE drone_flight_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  altitude FLOAT,
  speed FLOAT,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE DroneFlightData (
  flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  altitude FLOAT,
  speed FLOAT,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE DroneInfo (
    drone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    altitude DECIMAL,
    speed DECIMAL,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE FlightData (
    flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT,
    flight_date DATE,
    duration INT,
    distance DECIMAL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_drone FOREIGN KEY (drone_id) REFERENCES DroneInfo(drone_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TelemetryData (
    telemetry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_drone FOREIGN KEY (drone_id) REFERENCES DroneInfo(drone_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FlightPath (
    path_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    flight_id INT,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    altitude DECIMAL,
    speed DECIMAL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_flight FOREIGN KEY (flight_id) REFERENCES FlightData(flight_id)
);

CREATE TABLE drone_flights (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  altitude FLOAT,
  speed FLOAT,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE drone_battery (
  battery_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  drone_id INT,
  battery_level FLOAT,
  battery_health VARCHAR(50),
  last_charged_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE drone_weather (
  report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  wind_speed FLOAT,
  weather_condition VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE drone_maintenance (
  maintenance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  drone_id INT,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_cost FLOAT,
  maintenance_date DATE
);
